system.description: The character turbocharges all of another character's powers!
system.effect: The character picks one character within 5 spaces and boosts all of their powers. If the powers have ranges or effective areas or durations, these are doubled. If the powers affect a damage multiplier, add 1 to the effects. Any effects that normally happen with a Fantastic successes automatically happen on any success, not just a Fantastic one. If the target's powers have costs, the character must pay the highest of them or a minimum of 15 Focus.
